name: youtube-cloud-sync
description: A Node.js Lambda for consumminng YouTube push notifications and sending the video to a cloud provider. It uses the [YouTube Push Notifications API](https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/guides/push_notifications), the [YouTube Data API v3](https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/) and the [OneDrive API](#). Subscriptions are processed, sending YouTube videos to a cloud provider.
author: Jackson Delahunt
